articles.author: Kara Fox, Krystina Shveda, Natalie Croker and Marco Chacon, CNN
articles.title: How US gun culture stacks up with the world - CNN
articles.description: Ubiquitous gun violence in the US has left few places unscathed over the decades. As the tally of gun-related deaths continue to grow daily, here's a look at how American gun culture compares to the rest of the world.
articles.content:
Shortly after a mass shooting in Tasmania, Australia banned rapid-fire rifles and shotguns and tightened licensing rules. Over the next decade, gun deaths dropped by 51%.

articles.title: Shake the habit of spending too long sitting, your mental health will thank you - Malay Mail
articles.description: NEW YORK, Nov 26 — During the Covid-19 pandemic, restrictive measures like lockdowns, curfews and stay-at-home orders often made our lifestyles more sedentary. But, according to an American study, sitting for too long can increase the risk of depression and a…
articles.content:
Scientists find that sitting more is linked to increased feelings of depression and anxiety. Picture courtesy of eclipse_images / Getty Images
